pageProduct.name: Schwarzkopf Extra Care Blonde Anti-Yellow Toning Purple Conditioner 250ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Extra Care Purple Conditioner is formulated with ANTI-YELLOW TECHNOLOGY with intense violet pigments to neutralise any remaining yellow & brassy tones. With OMEGAPLEX ANTIBREAKAGE
TECHNOLOGY + BLUEBERRY EXTRACT for hair repair & stronger hair

Your blonde, bleached or highlighted hair can become subject to
unwanted brassy and yellow tones and the hair can feel dry and
damaged. It requires special care to neutralise these unwanted tones
while repairing the hair for a cooler colour result and stronger hair.

EXTRA CARE PURPLE SHAMPOO offers:
+ DETANGLING
+ ANTI-YELLOW TECHNOLOGY FOR NEUTRALISATION OF YELLOW &
BRASSY TONES
+ OMEGAPLEX ANTI-BREAKAGE TECHNOLOGY FOR STRONGER HAIR
+ DEEP REPAIR & PROTECTION
+ VISIBLY IMPROVED HAIR QUALITY WITH INTENSE SHINE

Extra Care Purple Conditioner contains ANTI-YELLOW TECHNOLOGY with
intense violet pigments to revive and brighten gold, blonde and naturally grey
hair for a cooler result.

Made in Australia
100% Recyclable via TerraCycle. Visit TerraCycle.com for more details

Suitable For: Blonde, Bleached or Highlighted Hair

Size: 250mL

Hair Type: Blonde, Bleached or Highlighted Hair

KEY FEATURES

• Neutralises Yellow & Brassy Tones, with Anti-Breakage Technology
• 100% Recyclable via TerraCycle. Visit TerraCycle.com for more details
• EXTRA CARE formulas with LIQUID KERATIN, ADVANCED HAIR
TECHNOLOGY & NATURAL ACTIVES help repair existing
damage and provide protection with visibly improved hair
quality.
• Extra Care Purple Conditioner contains ANTI-YELLOW TECHNOLOGY with
intense violet pigments to revive and brighten gold, blonde and naturally grey
hair for a cooler result.

Warnings

Keep out of reach of children. This product is not recommended for highly bleached or very porous hair. Avoid contact with clothing, plastic, porous or absorbent surfaces. If spillage occurs, rinse immediately with cold water.

CAUTION

Keep out of reach of children. This product is not recommended for highly bleached or very porous hair. Avoid contact with clothing, plastic, porous or absorbent surfaces. If spillage occurs, rinse immediately with cold water.

IMPORTANT INFORMATION

Keep out of reach of children. This product is not recommended for highly bleached or very porous hair. Avoid contact with clothing, plastic, porous or absorbent surfaces. If spillage occurs, rinse immediately with cold water.

FLAMMABLE WARNING

No

Ingredients

Aqua (Water, Eau), Cetearyl Alcohol, Isopropyl Myristate, Behentrimonium Chloride, Distearoylethyl Hydroxyethylmonium Methosulfate, Stearamidopropyl Dimethylamine, Cetyl Palmitate, Dimethicone, Phenoxyethanol, Isopropyl Alcohol, Methylparaben, Parfum (Fragrance), Citric Acid, Cetrimonium Chloride, Polyquaternium-37, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot) Kernel Oil, Magnesium Citrate, Glycerin, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Sodium Hydroxide, Linalool, Hexyl Cinnamal, Hydrolyzed Keratin, Benzyl Salicylate, Steardimonium Hydroxypropyl Hydrolyzed Keratin, Vaccinium Myrtillus Fruit Extract, Sodium Chloride, Linalyl Acetate, Limonene, Acid Violet 43, Benzyl Alcohol, Potassium Sorbate, HC Blue No.12, Sorbic Acid

Directions

1. Use as a CONDITIONER: Apply to wet hair after shampooing. Rinse thoroughly.
2. Use as a MASK: Apply to wet hair after shampooing. Leave in for up to 5 mins. Rinse throughly.
We recommend using gloves with this product as staining may occur. Use regularly depending on the desired neutralisation level. Keep out of reach of children.
SAFETY INSTRUCTIONS: This product is not recommended for highly bleached or very porous hair. Avoid contact with clothing, plastic, porous or absorbent surfaces. If spillage occurs, rinse immediately with cold water.

SAFETY DIRECTIONS

Keep out of reach of children. This product is not recommended for highly bleached or very porous hair. Avoid contact with clothing, plastic, porous or absorbent surfaces. If spillage occurs, rinse immediately with cold water.

RECYCLABLE INFORMATION

Tube & Cap are Kerbside Recyclable. Tube & Cap can also be recycled via TerraCycle. Visit TerraCycle.com for details

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes

Recycling Code: 2 PEHD or HDPE
